sentences: Pildi allkiri oli väga selge ja loetav.
Illustratsiooni allkiri kirjeldas detailidelt nähtavaid objekte.
Lugeja ootas pildi allkirja ette lugeda.
context: The word 'pildi' in Estonian is a genitive form that means 'of the picture/image'. When used as part of 'pildi allkiri', it functions as a prepositional phrase meaning 'under the picture' or 'at the bottom of the picture', referring to text, signatures, captions, or subtitles located beneath an image.
